offline_mode_desc: Devotions downloaded to your device for offline access
change_lang_desc: Changes the language for app interface and devotions
author: Author
devotion_denied: Future devotions cannot be viewed now
devotion_unavailable_desc: Devotions will be available everyday starting from January 1, 2022. You can access other devotions from the Calendar page by selecting January 2021 for now or set a reminder from the Account page and we will remind you to read everyday.
otp_text: Verification code sent to this phone number
notification_body: Reminder to read your devotion everyday
